frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-disconnect-wifi
frozen.shortDescription: Adds a Disconnect option for Wifi in status menu, when a network is connected. Shows a Reconnect option, after network is disconnected.
frozen.longDescription: Adds a Disconnect option for Wifi in status menu, when a network is connected. Shows a Reconnect option, after network is disconnected.
